content:
Hi everyone,

Sorry for the delay announcing this month's meet-up, we had a few scheduling difficulties come up.

We've shuffled the schedule so that the talk on Ferrocene will happen in April instead, and I'll do my talk this month instead.

Here's the EventBrite link: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/creusot-tickets-260072873967

Really looking forward to the creusot lecture! Will there be any preprints available before the talk?
https://github.com/xldenis/creusot
Thanks for the presentation today @Xavier Denis ! :tada:
Tried packing in more content than usual :P

For the curious, we have a tech report which goes into more detail: https://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/hal-03526634/, though as that is several months old, there are quite a few new features that have been added since then :)
Additionally, if you're curious to run Creusot yourself, there are installation instructions in the README: https://github.com/xldenis/creusot
